text: geudae ijeon-edo hananim-eun seonjijadeul-eul bonaess-eudoe geujung-e geudae ege eongeubhan ja ieossgo eongeubhaji anihan ja iss-eoss-eumyeo eotteon seonjija do hananim heolag eobs-ineun eotteon yejeungdo ileuji anhhaessnola geuleona hana nim-ui myeonglyeong-i iss-eoss-eul ttae jinlilosseo simpan-i iss-eossgo geuttae geugos-ui bulsin jadeul-eun myeolmanghayeossnola
